sentences.en: A wedding is a family event.
sentences.cn: 婚礼是全家人的庆典。

sentences.en: For all its drama, the event was not unexpected.
sentences.cn: 虽然这件事带有戏剧性，但并不意外。

sentences.en: Hammer-throwing for women is not yet a major event.
sentences.cn: 女子链球运动还不是主要的赛事。

sentences.en: If we went to the theatre it was a very big event.
sentences.cn: 我们要是去看场戏，那可是件大事。

sentences.en: in that event, the US would incline toward a lifting of the arms embargo.
sentences.cn: 在那种情况下，美国可能会取消武器禁运。

sentences.en: in the event that an attack is launched, the defenders will have been significantly weakened by air attacks.
sentences.cn: 如果发动攻击，空中打击将使防卫者的防卫能力大大减弱。

sentences.en: It did give me a boost to win such a big event.
sentences.cn: 赢得如此重大的比赛确实使我信心倍增。

sentences.en: Kansas City area churches kicked in $35,000 to support the event.
sentences.cn: 堪萨斯城地区的教会为此事捐助了35,000美元。

sentences.en: Olga Korbut single-handedly turned gymnastics into a major event.
sentences.cn: 奥尔佳·科布特独自一人将体操变成了一项重要赛事。

sentences.en: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.cn: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

sentences.en: The champagne-soaked event took over the city's main thoroughfare.
sentences.cn: 该市的大街上到处香槟飘香，盛事热闹非凡。

sentences.en: The conference was an important social event (= an event at which people can meet each other ).
sentences.cn: 那次会议是一次重要的社交活动。

sentences.en: The cross-country section of the three-day event was held here yesterday.
sentences.cn: 3日比赛中的越野项目昨天在这里举行。

sentences.en: The event literally stopped the traffic.
sentences.cn: 这一事件几乎让交通陷于停顿。

sentences.en: The event was dreamed up by Mick Jagger.
sentences.cn: 这事是米克·贾格尔的凭空捏造。

sentences.en: The meeting has the potential to be a watershed event.
sentences.cn: 这次会议有可能成为具有转折性的事件。

sentences.en: This event will counteract such trends.
sentences.cn: 这一事件将会削弱此类趋势。

sentences.en: this will reduce the chance of serious injury in the event of an accident.
sentences.cn: 如果发生意外事故，这会减少重伤的可能性。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the entire evening was a total non-event.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，整个晚上都没什么特别有趣的事。

sentences.en: Watch this space for details of our next event.
sentences.cn: 请继续关注我们对下一事件的详细报道。

words.tran_cn: 多事的；重要的；多变故的；重大的
最后的，结果的；可能的；终于的

phrases.tran_cn: 在任何情况下，不管怎样
慈善活动；慈善赛；慈善事件
事件句柄；事件处理程序
在任何情况下，不管怎样
如果是那样的话；在那种情况下
主要事件；拳击比赛秩序册中最主要的一场

trans.tran_en: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual
